17,846: LinkedIn Followers
5,542: Meters Walked
2: Giant Statues ğŸ¤– ğŸ—½
Â¥7,000 : Raised for Charity

[ Glokyo NetWalking 05: Rainbow Bridge ]

Perfect sunny & breezy dayâ˜€ï¸
Thank you all for joining the walk!ğŸ™

LinkedIn came in STRONG this timeğŸ’ª

99% of the new people I meet come from hereğŸ˜‚
It's really cool to connect people!
(Even though I thought they were already connectedğŸ˜…)

Odaiba is a pretty remote location
So the fact that we could gather 7 professionals
At 12 on a Wed., shows me NetWalks are here to stay!â¤ï¸

See you next month!

events.title: Old to New!ğŸ¯
events.description:
0: ååˆº (Business cards)
7: Flags ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡§ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
100,000+: Combined Steps

[ Glokyo NetWalking 3 ]

My philosophy for organizing club events:
Let people be the color in the roomğŸ¨

Sure, I decorated & set the time,
But nobody realized the obvious:
The people ARE the eventğŸ«µ

We're outdoors now, but it's the same!

We walked from Asakusa to Sky TreeğŸ—¼
exchanging stories, laughs, & inspiration
(not business cards!)

Then everyone exchanged contacts and
made plans to hang out individuallyğŸ¤
Real people. Real connections.

Thanks so much for coming!

ğŸ¤ 10 total strangers
ğŸŒ 7 different countries

Thank you all for the INCREDIBLE afternoon!ğŸ™ 

What started as a random anti-å¿˜å¹´ä¼š idea, 
Became a real fun, meaningful, and impactful event. 

This is definitely becoming a regular thing! 

Couple takeaways:
- Walk + Talk + ğŸŒ is a winning combo
- NOTHING beats meeting face-to-face 
- This is exactly the community I've been looking for 
- Don't assume everyone on LinkedIn knows each otherğŸ˜…
